verses.1: Leitung mi khempeuh aw, Pasianʼ tungah lungdamna aw ging phasak un.
verses.2: Ama minthanna sa unla, ama tungah minthanna pia un.
verses.3: Pasianʼ tungah thu gen unla, “Nangma bawlnate bangzah ta-in dipkuathuai! Na vang lian mahmah ahih manin na mai ah na galte in nang hong mai-et uh hi.
verses.4: Leitung mi khempeuh in nangmah hong bia uh hi. Amaute in nangmah phatna la hong sak uh a, nangma minphatna la hong sak uh hi,” ci-in gen un.
verses.5: Hong pai unla, Pasianʼ sep sate mu un. Miteʼ lak a a bawlnate ah amah dipkuathuai hi.
verses.6: Amah in tuipi tui pen lei keu suaksak a, i pu i pate in a khe uh tawh tua tuipi na kantan uh hi. Tua bangin ama nasepna hangin eite i lungdam hi.
verses.7: Ama thahatna tawh a uk ngitnget pa, ama mit tawh minamte a encik ngitnget pa, mi lehdote in langpan kei uh hen.
verses.8: Mite aw, a hingte lak a a hong kem pa, i khe a hong taalsak lopa, eiteʼ Pasian phat un. Amah phatna aw kizasak tawntung un.
verses.10: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian aw, kote na hong sin khin a, mei tawh ngun a kisin bangin kote na hong sin khin hi.
verses.11: Nangmah in ngen sungah kote na hong tungsak a, ka nungzang uh ah van gikpi na hong suan hi.
verses.12: Ka galte uh nong tuancilsak a, tui le mei lauhuainate ka thuak uh hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in a tanzau munah kote nong paipih hi.
verses.13: Meihal biaknate tawh nangma inn sungah kei ka hong pai ding hi. Ka lungkham laitakin ka muk pan a a ging khia, ka kam a ka thuciamte nangma tungah kong pia ding hi.
verses.15: Ganhing thaute tawh meihal biaknate, tuutal a biakna khute tawh biakna kong pia dinga, bawngtalte le keelte tawh nangmah biakpiakna ka bawl ding hi.
verses.16: Pasian a zahtakte khempeuh aw, hong pai unla, hong za un. Kei-aʼ dinga ama bawl sate kong gen ding hi.
verses.17: Ama tungah huhna ngenin nakpi takin ka kiko a, lasakna tawh amah ka phat hi.
verses.18: Ka lung sungah mawhna kem leng, Topa in keima thu hong ngai lo ding hi.
verses.19: Ahih hangin Pasian in, keima thu hong ngai khin taktak a, keima thungetna aw, hong don khinzo hi.
verses.20: Amah in keima thungetna hong nolh loin, keima kiang panin a itna kip la khia lo ahih manin Pasian in thupha ngah tahen!
